author: bridge-bot
content: <glamperd> I just realised that when running the computation with dev tools open it runs many times slower. My 60s computation reduced to 10s. Make sure dev tools is not open if you're running a speed test.

author: bridge-bot
content: <glamperd> @CarlBeek I doubt that this accounts for your comp being 100x slower on the Mac. Looking into build options that might affect that.

author: bridge-bot
content: <CarlBeek> i did one run with dev tools open and another with it closed and the time was not significantly different

author: bridge-bot
content: <CarlBeek> @glamperd i like the direction this is going in üëç the decisions genrally make a lot of sense, I'll provide feedback as comments on your doc

author: bridge-bot
content: <CarlBeek> @glamperd is the api at https://hub.apitree.com/stonebell/KZG-MPC-participant/ yours? if so can you change the licence to cc0 please. (it's a bit easier than apache 2 as we don't have to maintain licence continuity)

author: bridge-bot
content: <glamperd> > <glamperd>  Ok, will do (re @CarlBeek: @glamperd is the api at https://hub.apitree.com/stonebell/KZG-MPC-participant/ yours? if so can you change the licence to cc0 please. (it's a bit easier than apache 2 as we don't have to maintain licence continuity))

author: bridge-bot
content: <CarlBeek> one idea i've been bouncing around is to have an alternate, simpler queue every ~8th day. where we switch to fixed timestaps for each slot with long (eg 8 min) deadlines to make it easier for contributors with slow custom implementations, air-gapped participants, those with crap hardware/internet, etc
